editor.label: Application Server - IIS6 ResumeWebSite
editor.description: This procedure continues server operation after it has been paused.

formElement.label: Host name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS server (if the procedure is run on the host itself use "localhost", the default value).

formElement.label: Web side ID:
formElement.documentation: Provide the site identification number to attach to the site that you want to resume.
